intro: Here's a list of helpful links I've found while researching Pentax K lenses roughly organized by topic.

oemHistLinks.name: The Pentax 'Course of History' Official Historical Timeline
History of Pentax: The Beatles, Tragedy, WW2 (Picture This! Podcast on YouTube)

lensSpecLinks.name: Guide to Pentax K-mount lenses at Pentaxians.eu
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (Great guide, served as a primary source of data for the K-mount table on this site)

lensSpecLinks.name: K-Mount Lenses at PentaxForums.com
lensSpecLinks.helpText: (A highly-active Pentax forum with extensive lens profiles including specs and user-submitted reviews. A highly-recommended resource for all Pentax equipment)

mountHistLinks.name: 'Summary of the K-Mount Evolution, Names, and Features' at Pentaxians.eu

reviewLinks.name: K-Mount Lenses at PentaxForums.com
reviewLinks.helpText: (The above link is repeated here with good reason: Pentax Forums is the best resource I've found for reviews and info on Pentax K lenses)

reviewLinks.name: Lens Reviews at Casual Photophile
reviewLinks.helpText: (High quality articles but unfortunately only covering a few Pentax lenses. Highly recommended also for their camera reviews and other articles)

reviewLinks.name: Pentax K Lens reviews from Ken Rockwell
reviewLinks.helpText: (Unfortunately only covers a few Pentax lenses)

repairLinks.name: PDF Manuals at Pentax-Manuals.com
repairLinks.helpText: (Contains user manuals and pamphlets for various Pentax cameras and lenses. (PDFs are password-protected, the password for all PDFs is 'Pentax')

miscLinks.name: The Manual Focus Lenses forum at MFLenses.com
miscLinks.helpText: (This is the most active forum I've found on the subject of MF lenses of all manufacturers. A good resource)

miscLinks.name: Guide to K-mount lens hoods at PentaxForums.com
Short explanation of Pentax Super-Multi Coating at Pentaxians.eu
